name: WildDraw
description:
A 3D Card game with a fantasy theme, mixed with MMO-RPG elements mainly the world exploration side.

WildDraw's story revolves around a world of wizards ruled by one powerful Wizard named “Vitruvius”, he himself made the card game in order to create a tournament in which the top 3 wizards will be promoted as his BodyGuards.

Made By  Team Hold Shift :

  • Anas Ben Ali
  • Elyes Kabous
  • Rayen Ben Driaa
  • Med Wassim Habibi
  • Mouheb Sliti
